messages.content: There are clear choices at this election: between a Tory Government who want a blank cheque for a hard Brexit and more austerity - or a Labour Government which will put the interest of the whole country first and build a Britain for the many not the few. Between the SNP using this election just to get another referendum - or a local Labour champion, who will focus on jobs, the economy and the public services we need to deliver a fairer society in Scotland.

issues.brexitEurope: a Tory Government who want a blank cheque for a hard Brexit
issues.economy: a local Labour champion, who will focus on jobs, the economy and the public services
issues.governance: put the interest of the whole country first and build a Britain for the many not the few

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Les Hood on behalf of Peter O'Donnghaile both at 14 MackEdible Drive, Fortrose, Printed by 21 Colour Limited, 21 Summerlee Street, Queenslie Industrial Estate, Glasgow G33 4DB.
